page.title: 04FINANCE COVENTRY S.W.
page.content: The{Banks}have Head Offices in the centre of Coventry.The{Building {Societies}also have their main offices near the City Centre and Estate Agents often act as agents for the smaller Societies.The Banks and the major Societies also have Branch Offices in the larger shopping centres in the residential parts of the City.There are 18 Banks and 11 Building Societies in the area. Many of the Banks are situated near the commercial areas so that the business people can pay in takings and have access to the necessary banking facilities. People use the Banks and Societies to deposit and save their money in and take out loans to buy expensive items. Societies only give loans to buy and improve property.
